Quick search

Manipulation of Data Streams¶

Set of functions specific to manipulate Stream Objects.

BlockCanvas oriented¶

read_from_filesystem Function to read data from a filesystem with a give file structure just by specifying ID and time interval.
stack_stream Calculate mean of all traces in stream
stream_stack_distance_intervals Stack average traces in a stream if their distance difference is smaller than interval.
stream_envelope Calculate the envelopes of all traces in a stream.
stream_combine Combins two streams into a single one
stream_add_lat_lon_ele Add lat lon ele information to each trace if of a stream, if available.
stream_save_sac Save a stream in sac format
stream_downsample Downsample all the traces in the input stream to a desired frequency.
stream_filter Filter each trace of a Stream according to the given parameters
trace_sym_pad_shrink_to_npts Pads with 0 or shrink the trace data symmetrically to npts points.
corr_trace_to_obspy Convert a correlation trace dictionary to an obspy trace.
